shortdesc.ph: Used to configure media streaming options.
Used to set media publishing options for the host.

plentry.pd:
Sets whether to publish the camera-captured video:
: Publish the camera-captured video.
: (Default) Do not publish the camera-captured video.

Sets whether to publish the microphone-captured audio:
: Publish the microphone-captured audio.
: (Default) Do not publish the microphone-captured audio.

Sets whether to publish audio captured from a custom audio source:
: Publish audio from the custom audio source.
: (Default) Do not publish audio from the custom audio source.

Sets whether to publish video captured from a custom video source:
: Publish video from the custom video source.
: (Default) Do not publish video from the custom video source.

Sets whether to publish the media player audio track:
: Publish the media player audio track.
: (Default) Do not publish the media player audio track.
Sets the media player source to publish. You can get the media player ID after calling the method.
The video track ID returned after calling the method. The default value is 0.

Sets whether to publish video captured by the camera:
: Publish camera video.
(Default): Do not publish camera video.

Sets whether to publish audio captured by the microphone:
: Publish microphone audio.
(Default): Do not publish microphone audio.

Sets whether to publish audio captured from a custom audio source:
: Publish custom audio.
(Default): Do not publish custom audio.

Sets whether to publish video captured from a custom video source:
: Publish custom video.
(Default): Do not publish custom video.

Sets whether to publish audio track from media player source:
: Publish media player audio.
(Default): Do not publish media player audio.
Sets the ID of the media player source to publish. This value is obtained by calling .
Video track ID returned by . Default is 0.
